products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Halo Blackout Oyster
products.description: Halo blackout perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The special blackout coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces light, heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows, conservatories and bedrooms. Perfect fit pleated blind halo blackout oyster available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
